name: Cult of Fire
description:
In this game, you take on the role of a demon tasked with raiding human villages and either killing or converting their inhabitants. Your ultimate goal is to destroy the human castle and assert your dominance over humanity. With various strategies and abilities at your disposal, you must plan and execute your attacks carefully while fending off any attempts by the humans to defend themselves. Will you emerge victorious and claim the castle as your own, or will you meet your downfall at the hands of humanity? The fate of both worlds rests in your hands.

This game was made in 48 hours.
